name: Wizard Battle Classic
description:
Welcome to Wizard Battle; Classic! Test your metal as one of the four great wizards. Larry, the Wizard of Fire; Dinah, the Wizard of Lightning; Craig, the Wizard of Ice; and Dan, the Wizard of Nature. Play as one of them and fight against friends with their greatest constructs, Golems, and then themselves! Have fun and battle in Wizard Battle: Classic.

Made by: 

- Charlie Peavey (Artist)

- Allen Fortney (Artist)

- Jacob Youakim (Programmer/Audio)

- Alex Hallee (Programmer)

- Keenan Barber (Programmer)

- Darin Belleau (Programmer)
